company.description: The name of the company associated with the lead.

site.description: The website associated with the lead.

billingPostalCode.description: The postal code for billing address.

website.description: The website associated with the lead.

mainPhone.description: The main phone number of the lead.

annualRevenue.description: The annual revenue of the company associated with the lead.

numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees in the company associated with the lead.

industry.description: The industry of the company associated with the lead.

mktoCompanyNotes.description: Notes specific to the company in Marketo.

externalCompanyId.description: The external company ID associated with the lead.

id.description: The unique identifier of the lead.

mktoName.description: The name of the lead in Marketo.

personType.description: The type of person, e.g., individual or corporate entity.

mktoIsPartner.description: Indicates if the lead is a partner in Marketo.

isLead.description: Indicates if the record is a lead.

mktoIsCustomer.description: Indicates if the lead is a customer in Marketo.

isAnonymous.description: Indicates if the lead is anonymous.

salutation.description: The salutation or form of address for the lead.

firstName.description: The first name of the lead.

middleName.description: The middle name of the lead.

lastName.description: The last name of the lead.

email.description: The email address of the lead.

phone.description: The phone number of the lead.

mobilePhone.description: The mobile phone number of the lead.

fax.description: The fax number of the lead.

title.description: The job title of the lead.

contactCompany.description: The name of the contact person's company.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the lead.

address.description: The complete address of the lead.

postalCode.description: The postal code of the lead.

personTimeZone.description: The time zone of the person.

originalSourceType.description: The original source type of the lead data.

originalSourceInfo.description: The original source information of the lead.

originalSearchEngine.description: The original search engine used by the lead.

originalSearchPhrase.description: The original search phrase used by the lead.

originalReferrer.description: The original referrer of the lead.

emailInvalid.description: Indicates if the email address is invalid.

emailInvalidCause.description: The reason for email address being invalid.

unsubscribed.description: Indicates if the lead is unsubscribed.

unsubscribedReason.description: The reason for lead being unsubscribed.

doNotCall.description: Indicates if the lead should not be contacted.

mktoDoNotCallCause.description: The reason for the lead being in do not call list in Marketo.

doNotCallReason.description: The reason for not contacting the lead.

marketingSuspended.description: Indicates if marketing is suspended for the lead.

blackListed.description: Indicates if the lead is blacklisted.

blackListedCause.description: The reason for lead being blacklisted.

mktoPersonNotes.description: Notes specific to the person (lead) in Marketo.

anonymousIP.description: The anonymous IP address of the lead.

inferredCompany.description: The inferred company based on lead data.

inferredCountry.description: The inferred country based on lead data.

inferredCity.description: The inferred city based on lead data.

inferredStateRegion.description: The inferred state region based on lead data.

inferredPostalCode.description: The inferred postal code based on lead data.

inferredMetropolitanArea.description: The inferred metropolitan area based on lead data.

inferredPhoneAreaCode.description: The inferred phone area code based on lead data.

emailSuspended.description: Indicates if the email address is suspended.

emailSuspendedCause.description: The reason for email address being suspended.

emailSuspendedAt.description: The date and time when the email address was suspended.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the lead was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the lead was last updated.

externalSalesPersonId.description: The external sales person ID associated with the lead.

leadPerson.description: The lead person associated with the lead data.

leadRole.description: The role of the lead within the company.

leadSource.description: The source from which the lead was acquired.

leadScore.description: The score assigned to the lead.

urgency.description: The urgency level associated with the lead.

priority.description: The priority level associated with the lead.

relativeScore.description: The relative score of the lead.

relativeUrgency.description: The relative urgency associated with the lead.

rating.description: The rating given to the lead.

personPrimaryLeadInterest.description: The primary lead interest of the person.

leadPartitionId.description: The unique identifier for partitioning leads.

leadRevenueCycleModelId.description: The unique identifier of the revenue cycle model.

leadRevenueStageId.description: The unique identifier of the revenue stage.

acquisitionProgramId.description: The unique identifier of the program through which the lead was acquired.
